Uses of Interface
de.saxsys.mvvmfx.utils.commands.Command

  • Packages that use Command 
    Package Description
    de.saxsys.mvvmfx.utils.commands  

    • Uses of Command in de.saxsys.mvvmfx.utils.commands

      Classes in de.saxsys.mvvmfx.utils.commands that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommandBase
      Basic implementation of a Command.
      class  CompositeCommand
      CompositeCommand is an aggregation of other commands - a list of Command references internally.
      class  DelegateCommand
      A Command implementation of a Service that encapsulates an Action (Task) which can be called from the UI - for example after a button click.
      Methods in de.saxsys.mvvmfx.utils.commands with parameters of type Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CompositeCommand.register(Command command)
      Registers a new Command for aggregation.
      void CompositeCommand.unregister(Command command)
      Unregisters a Command from aggregation.
      Constructors in de.saxsys.mvvmfx.utils.commands with parameters of type Command 
      Constructor and Description
      CompositeCommand(Command... commands)
      Creates a CompositeCommand with given commands.
